translations: v．潦草地书写，涂鸦：以潦草、难以辨认的笔迹书写或绘画。
· He was scrawling notes on a piece of paper.
他在一张纸上潦草地写着笔记。

sentences.sentence: "So," he said as he was scrawling, "what will be my duties with the company?"
sentences.translation: “所以，”他一边龙飞凤舞一边说，“我在军团的职责是什么呢？”

sentences.sentence: If you find me scrawling on a piece of paper, please don't peep over my shoulders.
sentences.translation: 当你发现我在纸上胡乱涂写的时候，请不要在我身后窥视。

sentences.sentence: If you find me scrawling on a piece of paper. please don't peep over my shoulders.
sentences.translation: 当我在纸上胡乱涂写的时候，请不要在我身后窥视。
